numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Legacy applicants have a higher chance of acceptance.
2. The acceptance rate for legacy applicants stays consistent almost until the 50th percentile.
3. There is a dip in the estimated legacy boost between the 75th percentile and the 90th percentile.
4. I wonder why there is a dip in the estimated legacy boost between the 75th percentile and the 90th percentile.
5. The estimated legacy boost increases suddenly after the 50th percentile.
6. I wonder why the estimated legacy boost increases suddenly after the 50th percentile.
7. This topic is relevant to me.
8. This topic is relevant to my community.
9. Soon we will apply to colleges.
10. This topic may impact which schools we consider.
11. We may avoid some schools because we fear rejection.
12. The headline is: Are college admissions considering wealth over grades and work ethic?
